items.title: The 12 Best Wilderness Survival Movies, Including Cast Away & The Martian
items.description: The best wilderness survival movies depict the fear, desperation, and triumph that come from deciding to live in the face of uncaring nature.

items.title: The Monkey Brings Back A Great Horror Subgenre Pioneered By Sam Raimi & John Landis
items.description: With its gory gags and splatstick humor, The Monkey brings back a classic horror subgenre that was originally pioneered by Sam Raimi and John Landis.

items.title: 10 Highway Thriller Movies That Make Us Want To Stay Off The Road
items.description: The lonesome highway is the perfect setting for a devious thriller movie full of literal and narrative twists and turns, not to mention violence.
